definition: short stiff hairs growing on the face, legs, underarms, or other body part, after a period of not shaving
details:
noun
- short stiff hairs growing on the face, legs, underarms, or other body part, after a period of not shaving
= example: short stiff hairs growing on the face, legs, underarms, or other body part, after a period of not shaving
- material consisting of seed coverings and small pieces of stem or leaves that have been separated from the seeds
